sentences: Park Gwang-hyun (born October 11, 1977) is a South Korean actor and singer.
After winning the 1997 SBS Top Talent Competition, Park has appeared in television dramas, notably The Bean Chaff of My Life (2003), Sweet Buns (2004), Pink Lipstick (2010),
In 2012, he made his musical theatre debut with Catch Me If You Can, followed by The Scarlet Pimpernel and Summer Snow in 2013.
On December 7, 2014, Park married his non-celebrity wife.
